<h2 align="center">
  REST Countries API with color theme switcher
</h2>

A Frontend Mentor code challenge.

The challenge is to integrate with the REST Countries API to pull country data and display it like in the design. I chose Gatsby as a front-end framework.

_Live version here: [https://gatsby-rest-countries.netlify.com](https://gatsby-rest-countries.netlify.com?utm_source=github)._
